definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {ReapplicationDelay:1,Radius:2f,Duration:60,Color:4015891}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block 2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">effect give @e[distance=0.2..4] weakness 6 0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block
